cleaned_text: Balance of Nature is an all-natural nutritional supplement company that was founded by Dr. Douglas Howard in 1997. He did lots of research and came away with one goal in mind: to promote better health and quality of life through preventative nutrition, results-based research, and quality education. Dr. Howard studied phytochemicals and found that these powerful nutrients were what gave fruits and vegetables their color, smell, and taste. He also found that phytonutrients are what make fruits and vegetables good for us and that if we regularly consume them we could become a healthier world. It is recommended to consume 10 or more servings of fruits and vegetables every day. Most people do not get this amount. Balance of Nature Fruits & Veggies is an easy way to get more servings of fruits and vegetables every day. This will help promote better overall health. Balance of Nature products are made out of whole food, that is the only ingredient. The products have no additives of any kind. Balance of Nature does not use fillers, extracts, heat exposure, added vitamins, chemicals, added sugar, or synthetics. Balance of Nature strives to educate people in all areas of health including physical, spiritual/mental, and chemical/nutritional. To help boost these areas of health, Balance of Nature offers free Health Coaching for their Preferred Membership Customers. These Health Coaches will help educate, support, set goals, and communicate. Balance of Nature cares about the overall health and wellbeing of everyone. Balance of Nature customers have seen lots of success from consistently taking their products. Balance of Nature strives to make everyone healthier through their high-quality products and health-based philosophies.
